name: Kabuki-Z
overview: Kabuki-Z is a 2D side-scrolling beat'em up. The player controls a heroic samurai wielding a katana, who battles various common and mythological Japanese foes. Kabuki-Z has typical gameplay - the player goes right and slashes enemies, various bosses wait at the end of the level. The game has blood and "fatalities". Kabuki Z has five levels.
